overview.en: XMAX is a blockchain ecosystem and a set of developer tools built to support the next-generation of blockchain entertainment. The XMAX team is bringing decentralized applications (DApps) to the world by empowering developers with the tools to simplify blockchain development using a JavaScript-based smart contract language (WebX.js) and a full 3D game engine designed for building blockchain applications without complex programming. XMAX will enable scalable decentralized applications and uses a main-chain plus a choose your own consensus mechanism side-chain architecture.
overview.zh: XMAX是一条泛娱乐公链，以“一条公链+多条功能性侧链”并行的形式来运行，并提供强大的SDK为泛娱乐DAPP开发商提供方便快捷的开发工具。XMAX除了提供多种底层多媒体库外，还整合了强大的游戏引擎，让游戏和泛娱乐数字资产上链更容易。主链基于VRF的共识体系+侧链多层共识机制，造就多链高并发TPS，最大限度简化区块链场景落地。
